data.name: Heart Lock Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The music of Heart Lock was inspired by learning of the deepest, darkest corners of your own heart. Enjoy the ebb and flow of beautifully hopeful flutes and violins seen in Metaconscience, only to later encounter some mysterious and reflective arrangements like Leaking Heart. Embrace the music, only then will you abolish Heart Lock once again.
data.about_the_game: The music of Heart Lock was inspired by learning of the deepest, darkest corners of your own heart. Enjoy the ebb and flow of beautifully hopeful flutes and violins seen in Metaconscience, only to later encounter some mysterious and reflective arrangements like Leaking Heart. Embrace the music, only then will you abolish Heart Lock once again.
data.short_description: Continue to embrace the immersion of the Heart Lock soundtrack.

fullgame.name: Heart Lock: A Cozy Intro To Spellcraft
